note.p: American dentist. Went into dental practice in Philadelphia in 1849. MD, Jefferson Medical College, 1852. Professor of operative dentistry and dental physiology, Pennsylvania College of Dental Surgery, 1857–8; professor of general anatomy and physiology, 1858–62. Co-founder of the Philadelphia Dental College, 1863; professor of anatomy, physiology and hygiene. Editor of Dental Cosmos from 1859.
